title: Integrative Energy Medicine Institute - Milford, CT
description: Specialties: Training certifications to help yourself and others are offered through the energy medicine program: starting with Reiki 1 to mastership, and EFT, and the Mastery of Awareness program with classes in Shamanism, Shamanic Healing, Divination/psychic development, Therapeutic Dream Analysis and more advanced training such as Soul Retrieval, Psychopomp... View class curriculum & schedule online. Private sessions available by appointment only. Established in 2008. The Integrative Energy Medicine Institute was founded by Chantal Guillou-Brennan. It is dedicated to the research and application of energy medicine modalities integrated into a coherent body of knowledge. Two program of study complement each other: the Energy Medicine program focuses on application, the Mastery of Awareness program expands awareness of the multidimensional human body. Participants begin their journey by healing themselves with the Shamanism 101 class and the Reiki 1 class both adding to their understanding of who they are and why they are here. Then they go on to develop a deeper partnership with Spirit and develop their HSP with the Shamanic Divination and the Reiki 2. Mastering their innate skills with more advanced and specialty training: Reiki 3, Advance Chakra Class, Energy Medicine class, Shamanic Healing, Shamanic Reiki, Soul Retrieval, Psychopomp, Therapeutic Dream Analysis, Psychic Development, Ceremonies for Healing, Elemental Power-Inner Wisdom...
